     JANET PLEADS FOR HELP!!                                           "I've opened a Travel Agency designed to assist Humans visiting Habitat --  especially those visiting for the     first time."                                                                "But, I've found it difficult to      describe this world to the folks in   that world, and I need help. That's   why I'm sponsoring a contest -- the   "Habitat for Mere Humans" contest."                      3

  WIN PRIZES FOR DESCRIBING HAB                                         "There are 2 categories:                                                   1) What Habitat is; and               2) Why a human would want to visit.                                         "Two prizes will be awarded for each  category -- 1st place gets 5 free     hours of plus time, 2nd place wins    a Lucasfilm game! See the next page   for the rules."                                          4

 "HABITAT FOR MERE HUMANS" RULES 1) Deadline for Entries is Friday,       April 8, 1988. Entries should be      H-mailed to 'Habitravel' and must     fit on ONE piece of Habitat mail.  2) Contestants may enter as many         times as they wish, but will be       eligible to win only one prize.    3) All entries become the property       of Quantum Computer Services,         which reserves the right to adapt,    use or publish any or all entries.                    5
